sense.def:
To popularize something
pomeni narediti nekaj, da se bo za določeno stvar zanimalo ali ob njej uživalo veliko ljudi.

seg.quote: Television has done a great deal to popularize snooker.

sense.def:
To popularize an academic subject or idea
pomeni narediti nekaj, da bo znanstveno področje ali razmišljanje laže dostopno navadnim ljudem;

seg.quote: Scientific notions soon become inaccurate when they are popularized.
